artist: Artist: Alex Katz; Publisher: Peter Blum Edition, New York
creditline: Gift of David and Lisa Erickson
description: black pigment on cream paper; vertical black lines on left and right side form tree trunks; black lines with abstract cream shapes form branches, leaves and foliage throughout image; at center of image cream shapes form house with pointed roof; cream wall with black window with cream shutters in center of image; cream chimney; abstract cream shapes form path by house; paper has rough edges
image_copyright: © Alex Katz %2F Licensed by VAGA at Artists Rights Society %28ARS%29%2C NY
provenance: John C. Erickson, New York; Lisa and David Erickson, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2018.
title: Landscapes
